Text: FW ETS Remodel BudgetYfyi Original Message From Terech Henry Sent Wednesday August PM To Daily Pamela Cc Akhave Billie Soyal Tara Subject ETS Remodel BudgetY Pam The following is a summary of estimated costs for the remodel and occupancy of Levels in ECN These are present estimates and ETS would receive formal hard budgets at project inception and only be charged actual costs Construction Design Churn Furniture Contingency Total Please feel free to set a meeting time with Tara should you want to discuss details Regards Henry

Re Space Planning Cc the process of thinking about what is needed to plan our space for the future we need to pull together some very simple information from each of you Please provide the following to Rod Hayslett or to me as soon as possible Number of work spaces by category Office Cubiclework station high walls Cubiclework station low walls Number of additional work spaces visitors auditors etc Number of ConferenceTeam Rooms Small person Medium person Large more than please specify File Rooms Specify the linear footage of file space required andor list special requirements for maps etc Special Model Office Computer RoomsCold Rooms Map Tables andor walls Writable walls Video Conference EquipmentConnections Other Also please identify one person from your organization that can be used for coordination purposes For instance Rod Hayslett will assign Kathy Campos for his section Thanks for your help in this effort

Re Space Planning Cc the process of thinking about what is needed to plan our space for the future we need to pull together some very simple information from each of you Please provide the following to Rod Hayslett or to me as soon as possible Number of work spaces by category Office Cubiclework station high walls Cubiclework station low walls Number of additional work spaces visitors auditors etc Number of ConferenceTeam Rooms Small person Medium person Large more than please specify File Rooms Specify the linear footage of file space required andor list special requirements for maps etc Special Model Office Computer RoomsCold Rooms Map Tables andor walls Writable walls Video Conference EquipmentConnections Other Also please identify one person from your organization that can be used for coordination purposes For instance Rod Hayslett will assign Kathy Campos for his section Thanks for your help in this effort
Rentable Square FeetSquare Feet per person

Re Timingif its going to be months before the upper floors become available to us should we reconsider Forwarded by Pamela DailyFGTEnron on PM From Bill CT on PM Sent by Nina CT To Pamela NRON cc Bill CT Deborah CT Rod NRON Subject Re Timing nd Quarter Pamela NRON PM To Bill CT cc Rod NRON Deborah CT Subject Timing In an effort to evaluate the feasibility of constructing our existing space vs waiting for the s bank we need to know the timing on the availability of EB and for the ETS restack Please respond directly to Rod Hayslett copy me please Thanks for your help
Lunchare you free for lunch with Rod and me on Thursday Feb rd
EB FenstadFacilPamthis is the meeting we discussed

Re Friday April styou Just let me know if there is anything else I can do to help Have a great evening Rick Dietz PM To Pamela NRON cc Subject Re Friday April st Thanks for taking the lead on this You are a wonderful organizer Rick Pamela Daily PM To Alma NRON Victoria MartinezET NRON cc Richard nron Karon O NRON Rick DietzET NRON Charles CT Subject Re Friday April st Received confirmation today that your moves are on the churn list for Friday evening April st Please let me know if anything changes on the construction timing of EB Have a great weekend Forwarded by Pamela DailyFGTEnron on PM MoveTeam ECT PM Sent by Jose CT To Pamela NRON cc Subject Re Friday April st Your request will be added to the churn Thanks Jose Pamela NRON PM To Move CT cc Rick DietzET NRON Alma NRON Subject Friday April st Do you have room on the Friday evening churn for these moves Please advise Thanks
TomorrowDo you have any problem if we Joanie and I both are out tomorrow She has an afternoon appointment I can reschedule if you need me to
How are youHope things are going okayWhat time is your appointment Remember Ill be out tomorrow Can reach me at home

FW Sale of Teknion Furniture to EOGRfyi will talk to you tomorrow about it Original Message From Wilson Reggie Sent Tuesday November PM To Daily Pamela Cc Larson Christopher Subject Sale of Teknion Furniture to EOGR Pam As you know we negotiated a deal for EOGR to take over our recently vacated space at AC and We also negotiated a deal for them to purchase only the Teknion workstations which were already in the spaces on Levels not furniture The total purchase price is plus all taxes Ive been informed that the former EI groups report up to ETS Therefore the Bill of Sale shall be signed by an officer in ETS Rod Hayslett not EPSC The Bill of Sale has been prepared by our legal team and is ready for Rod Hayslett to sign I would like to get the document to you for signature and over to EOGR for signature by Friday Let me know if you need anything further Thanks Reggie

RE Floor space billing corrections Cc I think for December we should leave it as is while we see what the fallout is going to be But if we do not have plans to build by yearend it probably should go to Corp vacant ROD do you agree Original Message From Bubenko Deborah Sent Tuesday November AM To Frausto Ruthann Holloway JoAnn Cc Mann Ruth Daily Pamela Subject RE Floor space billing corrections And by the waydo we want to keep it that way for EB or do we want to switch to another category Corp vacant since you guys are not using that floor What do you think Pam Deborah Original Message From Frausto Ruthann Sent Tuesday November AM To Holloway JoAnn Cc Mann Ruth Daily Pamela Bubenko Deborah Subject RE Floor space billing corrections Youre right Thanks Ruthann x Original Message From Holloway JoAnn Sent Tuesday November AM To Frausto Ruthann Cc Mann Ruth Daily Pamela Bubenko Deborah Subject RE Floor space billing corrections Ruthann In October and November the billing for the entire st floor was taken to per managements direction while under reconstruction To my knowledge that is still the case Please contact Deborah Bubenko regarding construction completion Thank you Jo Ann Original Message From Frausto Ruthann Sent Tuesday November PM To Holloway JoAnn Cc Mann Ruth Daily Pamela Subject Floor space billing corrections The October EPSC invoice showed the following floor space being billed incorrectly to Room Should be billed to Sq ft ECN ECN Also on their October invoice there is an entry for rent correction for sqft The ticket number is EBR dated I looked at all my rent corrections submitted and it isnt one of mine Could you please advise what rooms this correction covers Thanks for your help Ruthann x
Timesheet Cc Kathy I took hrs vacation on November th and hrs discretionary holiday November st Im not planning to be out any other days but if there is a change Ill send you an update Thanks

RE Who is Ruthanns supervisorok Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Tuesday November PM To Daily Pamela Cc Batista Daniel Subject RE Who is Ruthanns supervisor they put it in the system as me but Ive told them it was you Original Message From Daily Pamela Sent Tuesday November AM To Hayslett Rod Subject Who is Ruthanns supervisor

Space OptionsAs of this morning the executives are still on schedule to move into the new building on December th Option Move Stan and Cindy to level Option Leave Stan and Cindy on Move you Danny whomever you and Stan decide to the empty offices on Also to consider in an effort to consolidate the Danny McCartys organization back into more functional environments Level is currently being used for Disaster Recovery thru yearend Levels and are vacant and available to us now Both floors are high density trader desks approximately desks per floor However these floors present a problem situation for Shelly et al because of Gas Control location Level has high density cubes and would be the fastest and most economical solution to fit DannyShelley groups on one floor in the upper stack The only down side to this floor is the lack of offices and team rooms only offices and large conference room My uderstanding is that Jim Fallon is planning to consolidate Broadband on level Danny McCarty is calling him to inquire about these plans and to discuss the possibility of relocating them to the s bank

Re Timingif its going to be months before the upper floors become available to us should we reconsider Forwarded by Pamela DailyFGTEnron on PM From Bill CT on PM Sent by Nina CT To Pamela NRON cc Bill CT Deborah CT Rod NRON Subject Re Timing nd Quarter Pamela NRON PM To Bill CT cc Rod NRON Deborah CT Subject Timing In an effort to evaluate the feasibility of constructing our existing space vs waiting for the s bank we need to know the timing on the availability of EB and for the ETS restack Please respond directly to Rod Hayslett copy me please Thanks for your help

RentWe are currently renting square feet without the swing floor AC At a price of per square foot per year Deborah Bubenko will reprice the floor estimate to include the storage cabinets and lights this week The original estimate of million did not include these

RE Status needed Cc Yes I talked to him again this morning He did not have the construction schedule but he thinks it will be done this week As soon as he calls to let me know its done Ill wheel the TVcart down I just did not want to have it down there unattached to anything things walk you know Anyway thanks for the update Ill let you know as soon as he calls me Have a great week Original Message From Armstrong Julie Sent Monday October PM To Daily Pamela Cc McCarty Danny Subject Status needed Pam Good news someone came by last week in regard to the TV cable but he got away before I could introduce myself and ask about the installation and timing Please advise a date when we can expect both the TV monitor and desk top copier Thanks Original Message From Armstrong Julie Sent Wednesday October PM To Daily Pamela Cc McCarty Danny Watson Kimberly Subject Status Pam As a follow up to our call today please obtain a specific date that we can expect the TV monitor setup It would be a shame to install cable and TV setup and move in the next month Also note that I have not heard from Iain regarding options on the table top desk copier Please advise status and date of expected delivery Thank you for your assistance

RE TV Monitor Cc I am still trying to find you a smaller TV on a cart Have not forgotten you Thanks for your patience Original Message From Armstrong Julie Sent Monday October PM To Daily Pamela Lipuscek Joan Cc McCarty Danny Subject FW TV Monitor Please note that it was preferred that the TV monitor be the standard size as we had on and the monitor be on a higher cartstand so the group could view it from respective areas The current TV and stand are rare large and protrude in the walkway in addition to not functioning It should be noted the cable is rather short and does not allow flexibility and movement Is the cable functioning We appreciate the current situation but would like to resolve in a timely manner Please advise Original Message From Armstrong Julie Sent Monday October AM To Daily Pamela Lipuscek Joan Subject TV Monitor Please note that the TV monitor is still not functioning Joan advised that someone was to come by Thursday to check out situation and I did not see individual by the time I departed at I was out of the office Friday and not certain of any activity that day

FW Dave Neubauer office Cc Joan could you please set up a churn request to relocate Dave Neubauers Houston office ECN to ECN Julie Armstrong x should be able to give you companycost center for the move charges Julie requested setting up this move after Linda Wehrings return next Monday so request middle of next week churn date Please also check with Linda x on Monday to see if she has anything to add to this request Since this is not his primary office there will not be very much to move other than equipment and furniture Also should check to see if there is a marker board in there already or if we need to move one in there for him Pat could you please outfit ECN with VP style furniture granite racetrack Mueller chairs black drum table along with Barritt guest chairs if they are not already in there before next week This will prevent moving the furniture from level then having to replace it when I backfill the office next week Thanks for your help Original Message From Armstrong Julie Sent Wednesday October PM To Daily Pamela McCarty Danny Cc Cappiello Deborah Wehring Linda Subject Dave Neubauer office Pam Please note that Dave Neubauer requested to move from the th floor to EB The EB office is empty and ready for movein Danny has approved the move and the location on the th floor has been challenging for Dave in regards to administrative assistance and when staffemployees are trying to locate him Please advise when we schedule Dave for a move It would be preferred to wait until Linda returns from vacation week of October th so we can properly handle the move If you have any questions please call me at x Thanks
